events.text: Hi there!
You’re probably wondering what’s going on here.
No worries! I’ll explain everything!
My name is Axi, and welcome to my cave!
Obviously, it’s really dark in here, so you’ll need to work together to find your way back out.
It’s totally safe in here though! You can’t get hurt anywhere around here.
Except maybe from mean words from your teammates.
But if you can communicate effectively and trust one another, then you’ll get out of here in no time!
Of course you will need to light up the area around you to know where you’re going.
As you can see, you emit only a small bit of light by yourself…
But as you might’ve noticed already, you will glow much brighter if you stand side by side with your friends!
Use this effectively to light up the path ahead.
So stick together and make your way to the waterfall up above!
Also, you will need to jump around a bit to get through the cave
But even if you’re not great at jumping, you can press SHIFT to spin in the air!
This can be used to save yourself from a fall, or to gain a bit more distance and height out of your jump!
And really that’s all you need to know for now.
Maybe spark a bit of conversation to get to know each other?
Talk about what you had for breakfast or something.
Or tell them about your favourite fact you discovered recently?
Don’t be afraid to talk to your friends, try to have some fun while you’re here! It’s a safe space after all.
I’ll be up ahead at the waterfall to guide you further once you make it through here.
See you on the other side!
